author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Replaced all forward references of edm::HepMCProduct with new Fwd.h file.
- This is in preparation for adding a versioned namespace to this class in the EVOLUTION branch

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1916
title: Added HepMCProductFwd.h file
